correctness.rationale: Major factual, traceability, and schema issues. Key problems: (1) Missing process: the article reports two distinct ALD processes (viscous-flow on Si wafers with 2 s dose/10 s purge; fluidized-bed on SiO2 particles with 4–10 min DEZ and 3–8 min H2O2 dosing and 10–27 sccm N2). Only one process is extracted; the particle process is absent. (2) Schema violations: processParameters.plasmaPower is null (must be omitted or be a valid object); processParameters incorrectly includes filmThickness at the top level (filmThickness belongs under thicknessControl only). (3) Time/unit errors: dosingTime and purgeTime are given as 2.0 ms and 10.0 ms but the article states 2 s and 10 s; if schema enforces milliseconds, values should be 2000 ms and 10000 ms. (4) Inconsistencies: deliveryMethod “manual needle valves” pertains to the fluidized-bed reactor, not the viscous-flow wafer reactor; yet the process lists substrate “Si wafers.” (5) Unsupported/fabricated parameters: flowRates (precursor/co-reactant/purging) are not reported for the wafer process; provided 10/15/20 are fabricated and units correspond to SCM-PER-MIN while the text mentions only N2 10–27 sccm for the fluidized bed. Pressure 0.5 mmHg is not given (text only says < 1 Torr). NucleationPeriod = 5 cycles and saturation = True are not stated; for particles, sub-saturating exposures are explicitly discussed. (6) Material properties not reported in the paper are populated: refractive index, absorption coefficient, a fixed band gap value (3.3 eV), roughness, film density (also with an implausible unit GM-PER-DeciM3), uniformity, conformality. (7) Electrical and device properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility, TFT metrics) are not present in the article. (8) Film composition: atomic ratio ~1:1 is stated for particle samples via ICP-AES, but “50%” elemental concentration is not reported; applying particle ICP-AES results to wafers is not supported. Correct elements: DEZ/H2O2 precursors, 100 °C, viscous-flow reactor, linear growth on wafers at 1.30 Å/cycle, and 80 cycles ≈ 10.4 nm are consistent. To correct: add a second process for the fluidized-bed particle coating; fix dosing/purge times and units; remove or justify unsupported flow rates, electrical/device/optical metrics, uniformity/conformality/roughness/density; align delivery method and pressure with text; remove null plasmaPower; remove extraneous top-level filmThickness in processParameters; ensure all values are traceable to the article.

completeness.rationale: Extraction is largely incomplete and contains multiple schema violations and non-traceable values. (1) Missing processes: The article clearly reports at least two distinct ALD processes—(a) ZnO on Si wafers in a viscous flow reactor (2 s dose, 10 s purge; <1 Torr; 100 °C; GPC ≈ 1.30 Å/cycle) and (b) ZnO on SiO2 nanoparticles in a fluidized bed reactor (N2 10–27 sccm; DEZ dose 4–10 min; H2O2 dose 3–8 min; 100 °C; GPC ≈ 1.62 Å/cycle). A multilayer Al2O3/ZnO/Al2O3 stability stack is also described. Only one wafer process is extracted; the particle process and multilayer process are absent. (2) Schema/units issues: plasmaPower is set to null (must be an object if present); an extra filmThickness field is present at processParameters level (not allowed by schema); dosingTime and purgeTime use unit ‘MilliSEC’ but numeric values correspond to seconds (2 and 10) rather than 2000 ms and 10000 ms—unit/numeric mismatch. (3) Non-traceable or incorrect values: pressure 0.5 mmHg (not reported; only “<1 Torr” stated); deliveryMethod “manual needle valves” belongs to the fluidized bed, not the wafer reactor; flow rates (10/15/20 SCM-PER-MIN) are fabricated for the wafer process; saturation=True is not supported (particle runs used sub-saturating exposures); nucleationPeriod=5 cycles not reported. (4) Material/device properties largely fabricated: refractive index, absorption coefficient, electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), uniformity variation, conformality aspect ratio, roughness (AFM), film density (XRR), and all TFT device metrics are not provided in the article. (5) Partial correctness: precursors (DEZ/H2O2), temperature (100 °C), substrate (Si wafers), and GPC on wafers (≈1.3 Å/cycle) are consistent; atomic ratio ~1:1 is qualitatively supported, but the 50% concentration value is not. To improve completeness: add separate process objects for the fluidized bed particle coatings (with correct dosing times in minutes, N2 flow 10–27 sccm, GPC 1.62 Å/cycle, substrate SiO2 particles) and for the multilayer Al2O3/ZnO/Al2O3 stack; correct time units (use ms values); remove or justify unreported parameters; and avoid null or extra fields that violate the schema.
